load_data(file_path=None)¶

Documentation pending on how to load environment raster data

overlay(range_map, plot=False)¶

To extract data from a raster only where it intersects with a vector feature. rasterio provides option to “burn” vector shapes into rasters (rasterize the geometry). Then we create a raster mask layer

get_data()¶
load_data(file_path=None)¶

Documentation on how to load shapefile environmental layer

save_data(full_name=None, driver='ESRI Shapefile', overwrite=False)¶

Saves the current (geopandas) data as a shapefile. The geopandas data needs to have geometry as a column, besides the metadata.
